mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(rno, bno, replytext, replyer) VALUES(reply_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer})
mapper.select:
SELECT rno, bno, replytext, replyer, regdate, updatedate FROM (
SELECT /*+INDEX(reply idx_reply_pk)*/ rownum rn, rno, bno, replytext, replyer, regdate, updatedate FROM reply WHERE bno=#{bno} AND rno > 0 AND rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} )WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
